advices_lang_16.html:
Are you sure?

Start accepting your first payments today

Hint
Readclose
Stuck? Time to become a PrestaShop Ninja! Learn how to use your Back-Office and start managing your online shop 50% faster!
  PrestaShop User Online Training

Are you a new online merchant and want to learn how to use your new Back-Office, discover new features and start selling quickly? Don’t lose any time. Join our comprehensive online training hosted by PrestaShop training experts, right from the comfort of your home!

Close More information

Advice
Joinclose

Discover the Power of 3500+ Modules and Themes to enhance your PrestaShop Store!

Advice
Learn moreClose
About to upgrade? How about giving your opinion on future releases before anyone else?

Advice
ReadClose
62% of comparison-site users will spend 25% more than any other online consumers: diversify your channels to capture new customers!
Advice Shopping Feed

Shopping Feed is a feed management system: easily promote and sell your products on price comparison websites and marketplaces.

Price comparison sites are an excellent source of qualified traffic and offer:

- lower average cost-per-click (CPC)

- higher conversion rates, since internet users who click your link have already seen the price, photo, description and sometimes even the delivery cost.

Marketplaces are an excellent sales vector:

- they see massive flows of daily traffic

- Internet users who visit these marketplaces are already in a purchasing mindset

Close Learn more

Advice
ReadClose
Surveys show that only 9% of executives are happy with the way they spend their time at work.

Tips of the day

What do accountants think?

52% of accountants would rather run a marathon than try and crack the sales tax code.

More information?
Tips of the day

Did you know there are specific tax rules for each state?

Clothing is exempt from Sales Tax in Pennsylvania, except for formal wear.

More information?
Tips of the day

How important are your sales tax records?

Ensure that your process for keeping sales records will help (not hurt) you in the case of a tax audit.

More information?
Tips of the day

Did you know there are specific tax rules for each state?

Product taxability laws are not consistent across state lines—what may be taxable in one state may be exempt in another.

More information?
Tips of the day

How can one zip code be miles apart when dealing with taxes?

A single ZIP code can have multiple tax rates.

More information?
Tips of the day

Are your customers’ tax exempt status updated?

Check that customers’ tax exempt status is updated and agrees with the term of their exemption certificate on file.

More information?
Tips of the day

What’s the average price to manage a sales tax audit?

It costs over $96k on average to manage a sales tax audit.

More information?
Tips of the day

Do you know the difference between an unsliced bagel and a sliced bagel, in New York?

Did you know that In New York, a bagel is sales taxes exempt, unless someone slices it for you, and then you have to pay sales tax?

More information?

Tips of the day

Did you know that gaining customer loyalty costs 5 x less than winning a new customer?

Sending emails and text messages is an effective, affordable way of keeping your customers up-to-date on your latest news and offers. SendinBlue is an all-in-one solution for managing emails and texts. Run it now for free!

More information?

Are you sure?

Start accepting payments now. It’s that simple.

SendinBlue is a unique Emailing & SMS solution which enables you to:

- Synchronize automatically your contacts (registered and unregistered) between your website and your SendinBlue account

- Create engaging emails without any HTML knowledge

- Choose your recipients with accuracy, thanks to our powerful segmenting tool

- Manage your emails efficiently (order confirmation, shipping products …)

- Boost your Open Rate

- Follow your results in real time

Did you know that personalization is one of the most efficient ways to increase online sales through conversion? By personalizing your online store every customer is individually targeted with items they are most likely to purchase at each step of their customer journey, enabling you to increase average order value by 25% and conversion by 65%!

Advice Find your menu module

 

  • If you are using the default theme:

Go to the Top horizontal menu module and add your new category to the “Selected items”.

 

  • If you have your own theme or a specific module for the menu:

The menu configuration could be different, so have a look at how your theme or this module works.
